resources.string: If you have not applied for a data plan, it is recommended to turn off mobile data. Otherwise, your carrier may charge you additional fees.
"Allow Google's location service to collect anonymous location data. Collection will occur even when no applications are running. To adjust this setting, go to Settings > Location services"
Let Google use your location to improve search results and other services
Location services allows maps and other apps to retrieve your location details using GPS
Monitoring apps for security and privacy
"We rely on you to use our product and features and hope you can help us by providing feedback."
After sales service will be activated the first time you use your phone
"Unable to setup Xiaomi account without a SIM card. You need a SIM card to use account synchronization, phone tracking etc."
Data traffic monitoring will remind you when your data plan has reached its limit.
